assets.instructions: Use SVG components for sprites if images are unavailable. Use 'lucide-react' for UI icons but style them to look chunky/pixelated if possible (e.g. stroke-width-2).

placeholders.fish: Use a simple SVG path for a fish shape.
placeholders.rod: Use a diagonal line with a hook.

universal_guidelines: Do not use rounded corners (rounded-none) to maintain pixel art aesthetic.
Use thick borders (border-2 or border-4) for all containers.
Shadows should be hard (no blur), simulated with box-shadow or extra divs.
Text should be legible. Use VT323 for longer text blocks.
Always provide visual feedback for interactions (button press, screen shake).
Ensure high contrast for outdoor visibility (mobile usage).
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'PixelCard' and 'PixelButton' as reusable components first. Replace standard Shadcn components with these custom pixel-styled versions where appropriate (e.g., Dialogs, Cards). Use the 'themes' object to dynamically change the background based on the selected stage.
